Welcome to the event center, where our small town atmosphere and hospitality make it the perfect venue. Whether your event is an equine/cattle event, home show, trade show, sporting event, business meeting, concert or a personal event such as wedding reception, our goal is to provide you with superior customer service to make it a success!!
